lyrics:
79 contributorsvermilion lyricsverse 1
she seems dressed in all the rings of past fatalities

enter the night that she came home forever

i get nervous perverse when i see her its worse

its now or never shes comin home forever

fixed and crazy aphid attraction

guitar solo
